name: Launchpad
description: Launches a custom sets of applications based on user-defined modes.

functions.name: launch_mode_command
functions.description: Launches all applications for a given mode.

mode.description: [required] The name of the mode to launch.

functions.name: close_mode_command
functions.description: Closes all applications associated with a specified mode.

mode.description: [required] The name of the mode to close.

functions.name: get_modes_command
functions.description: Returns a list of all currently available modes.

functions.name: add_mode_command
functions.description: Adds a new mode with a list of application names

mode.description: [required] The name of the mode to add.

functions.name: delete_mode_command
functions.description: Deletes an entire mode by name.

mode.description: [required] The name of the mode to delete.

functions.name: add_apps_to_mode_command
functions.description: Adds a new list of applications to an existing mode.

mode.description: [required] The name of the existing mode.

apps.description: [required] List of application names to add.

functions.name: remove_apps_from_mode_command
functions.description: Removes a list of applications from an existing mode.

apps.description: [required] List of application names to remove.

functions.name: list_apps_in_mode_command
functions.description: Returns a list of all apps in a mode
